thread.title: Erwin

author: Erwin
title: Erwin
text:
The service provided was actually hassle free but I ran the domain name through the CloudFlare test (www doesitusecloudflare com) which came up positive. I'm wondering if I can get any assurance of any issues regarding this event, in regards to account security, thank you.
EDIT: I guess this will be an issue for many affected sites, so we'll all have to be vigilant with our security.
